org.wonderly.jini2
Class HttpServerService

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.jini2.NameableObjectImpl
      org.wonderly.jini2.ConfigurableJiniApplication
          org.wonderly.jini2.PersistentJiniService
              org.wonderly.jini2.HttpServerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, Administrable, RemoteAdministrable, ServiceIDAccessor, HttpServerAccess, NameableObject, AppPersistenceIO
public class HttpServerService
extends PersistentJiniService
implements HttpServerAccess, RemoteAdministrable

This class provides a service that is an HTTP server information provider. It does not implement an HTTP server, but is pointed at the directory that an http server is providing service from. It allows a service to discover what the digest is for its codebase jar file(s).

Author:
Gregg Wonderly - gregg@wonderly.org
